summary.para: Gets an representation of the current DataPackage object.

param.name: dataObject
param.para: The address of an interface pointer that, when this method returns successfully, points to the IDataObject representation of the DataPackage object.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Wraps an instance as a Windows Runtime DataPackage.

param.name: dataObject
param.para: An interface pointer to the data object from which to build the DataPackage object.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides methods that enable you to set or retrieve a DataPackage object's , which the DataPackage uses to support interoperability. The DataPackage object is used by an app to provide data to another app.

remarks.para: Do not implement this interface. An implementation is provided as part of the DataPackage object.
